__e: Right now, they think I'm here acting as your friend.
You act as though you wanted me here for all time. With you as my only outside connection.
You guys act like you're so fucking high and mighty, like you've never made a goddamn mistake before.
I'll take you to the next town and you work the first show for me till I can get a replacement.
He's the only reason we're entertaining this town.
Tell me... where do you figure... in the plans your husband didn't have time to complete?
I need to know why you're behaving as if victory is so far away when to me, it seems that it is so close at hand.
Oh, yeah, that's the screaming part but I decided to sing it regular.
That's great. You know that to a performer, that's food, right?
